ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: when the stars fall in rapid succession,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: The stars turn dim and scatter,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: when the stars shall scatter away,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: the stars are made to fade away,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And when the stars fall down.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: when the stars shall be thrown down,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and when the stars lose their light,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And when the stars shall dart down,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: When the stars fall, losing their lustre;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And when the stars shall fall;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: when the stars are thrown down,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And when the stars fall, dispersing,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [81:2] and when the stars scatter, [when] they are extinguished and hurtle down towards the earth,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And when the stars fall) on the face of the earth,
